text: The required number of selection is given as 47 A5 4g 4y A ™ 4, s A 4 The number of selection without restriction — (the number of selections when 3 vertices are consecutive) - (the number of selections when 2 vertices are consecutive) = 100, -10-10x°C, [After selecting two consecutive vertices in 10 ways, the third can be selected from remaining 6 vertices] =120-70 =50
